content: the chucko hat by courtney buckalew-kramer for mosaic yarn studio ltd materials 1 skein katia peru or approximately 110-120 yards of a bulky yarn 16 us size 10 needle and us 10 double points or size to get gauge gauge 4 sts = 1 in ribbing cast on 72 stitches place marker and join in the round work k4 p4 ribbing for 9 /23cm decrease rounds change to double points when hat gets too tight to move comfortably around 16 circular round 1 k4 p1 p2tog p1 repeat around round 2 work even round 3 k1 k2tog k1 p3 repeat around round 4 work even round 5 k3 p1 p2tog repeat around round 6 work even round 7 k2tog k1 p2 repeat around round 8 k2 p2tog repeat around round 9 k2tog p1 repeat around round 10 k2tog repeat around 9 sts remain using tapestry needle thread tail through 9 remaining stitches and pull tight weave in ends © 2011 mosaic yarn studio ltd 1585 ellinwood st #101 des plaines il 60016 www mosaicyarnstudio com 847-390-1013
